name: Guest House Luiza
description:
Located in Borsh, 29.2 miles from Corfu Town, Guest House Luiza features air-conditioned rooms and free private parking.
Each room has a TV. Some units feature views of the sea or garden. Every room is equipped with a private bathroom fitted with a shower. Guest House Luiza features free WiFi throughout the property.
Guests can enjoy traditional Albanian food for breakfast, lunch or dinner at the property.
Glyfada is 31.1 miles from Guest House Luiza, while Sarandë is 13.7 miles away.

name: LIDO APARTMENTS
description:
One of our bestsellers in Himare! Set in Himare in the Vlorë County region, with Prinos Beach and Maracit Beach nearby, LIDO APARTMENTS offers accommodation with free private parking.
The air-conditioned units are furnished with parquet floors and feature a private bathroom, a flat-screen TV, free WiFi, desk, a living room, an equipped kitchen, patio and views over the garden. There is a seating and a dining area in all units.
A terrace is available for guests at the apartment to use.
Spille Beach is 1,300 feet from LIDO APARTMENTS.

name: Koks’ Guesthouse
description:
Situated in Himare, within 1,150 feet of Potam Beach and 1,800 feet of Prinos Beach, Koks’ Guesthouse features accommodation with a garden and free WiFi throughout the property as well as free private parking for guests who drive. Boasting family rooms, this property also provides guests with a terrace. The accommodation offers a 24-hour front desk, a shared kitchen and luggage storage for guests.
All rooms are fitted with air conditioning, a flat-screen TV with satellite channels, a fridge, a kettle, a shower, free toiletries and a wardrobe. All units will provide guests with an oven.
Guests at the guest house will be able to enjoy activities in and around Himare, like hiking.
Maracit Beach is less than 0.6 miles from Koks’ Guesthouse.

name: Holiwood
description:
Located in Himare, within 0.7 miles of Prinos Beach and 0.8 miles of Potam Beach, Holiwood provides accommodation with a garden and as well as free private parking for guests who drive. The accommodation offers a 24-hour front desk and room service for guests.
At the motel, every room is equipped with air conditioning and a private bathroom.
Holiwood offers a terrace.
Maracit Beach is 0.9 miles from the accommodation.

name: Q Bay Apartments
description:
Located on the beachfront in Qeparo and featuring a garden, Q Bay Apartments has free WiFi throughout the property. Boasting family rooms, this property also provides guests with a terrace. The accommodation provides a 24-hour front desk, a concierge service and luggage storage for guests.
At the guest house, each room has a patio. At Q Bay Apartments each room is fitted with a wardrobe and a private bathroom.
Qeparo Beach is 350 feet from the accommodation, while Borsh Beach is 1,950 feet away.

name: Hotel Prinos
description:
Offering a restaurant, Hotel Prinos is located on the beachfront in Himare, just a 5-minute walk from Potam Beach. Breakfast is served every morning and the rooms offer sea or mountain views.
With free WiFi access, the guest rooms here will provide you with a TV, a fridge and air conditioning. They also have a balcony, and each room has a private bathroom that comes with a shower.
At Hotel Prinos you will find a mini-market and there is free public parking on site.

name: Llaka Hotel
description:
One of our bestsellers in Himare! Located in Himare, 1,000 feet from Gjiri i Filikurit Beach, Llaka Hotel provides accommodation with a bar, free private parking, a garden and barbecue facilities. Featuring family rooms, this property also provides guests with a children's playground. The accommodation features a shared kitchen, room service and luggage storage for guests.
All units at the hotel are equipped with a seating area, a flat-screen TV with satellite channels and a private bathroom with free toiletries and a shower. All guest rooms at Llaka Hotel include air conditioning and a desk.
A continental breakfast is available daily at the accommodation.
You can play billiards at Llaka Hotel, and the area is popular for hiking.
Potam Beach is 1,650 feet from the hotel, while Llamani Beach is 0.6 miles away.
breakfast: Fabulous breakfast included with all options

name: Belvedere Hotel & Suites
description:
Situated 2,150 feet from Potam Beach, Belvedere Hotel & Suites features accommodation with a bar, a garden and a 24-hour front desk for your convenience. Both WiFi and private parking are accessible at the apartment free of charge.
Fitted with a patio, the units offer air conditioning and feature a flat-screen TV and a private bathroom with bidet and a hairdryer. For added convenience, the property can provide towels and bed linen for an extra charge.
Guests at Belvedere Hotel can enjoy a continental breakfast.
The accommodation offers a sun terrace.
There is a children's playground and a barbecue at this property and guests can go cycling nearby.
Prinos Beach is less than 0.6 miles from Belvedere Hotel & Suites, while Gjiri i Filikurit Beach is a 12-minute walk from the property.

description:

There is a fully equipped private bathroom with shower and a hairdryer.
A barbecue can be found at the aparthotel, along with a terrace.
Sarandë is 14.3 miles from Lagjini Oil, while Ksamil is 20.5 miles away.

name: Villa Vasilijani
description:
Set in Himare, 800 feet from Prinos Beach and 1,300 feet from Maracit Beach, Villa Vasilijani offers air conditioning. This villa offers free private parking and luggage storage space.
The villa is fitted with 2 bedrooms, 1 bathroom, a flat-screen TV with cable channels, a dining area, a fully equipped kitchen, and a balcony with sea views. For added convenience, the property can provide towels and bed linen for an extra charge.
Potam Beach is 1,500 feet from the villa.

name: Velco Bed and breakfast
description:
One of our bestsellers in Himare! Offering an on-site restaurant, Velco Bed and Breakfast is located in Himare, just 800 feet from Potam Beach. Free WiFi access is available in public areas and you can relax in the shared garden.
Each room features air conditioning and a balcony with garden and sea views. Each room also comes with a private bathroom with a bath or shower.
Breakfast is included in the rate and served each morning in the restaurant room. A mini-market is also available on site for your convenience.
If you are travelling by car, free private parking is possible on site.
breakfast: Exceptional breakfast included with all options

description:
Set in Borsh in the Vlorë County region, Apartamente Arturi features a garden. Located 0.9 miles from Borsh Beach, the property provides a bar and free private parking.
The air-conditioned homestay consists of 1 separate bedroom, 1 bathroom and a living room. A flat-screen TV is provided.
The homestay offers a terrace.

name: Villa Mimoza
description:
Located in Borsh, within 1 miles of Borsh Beach and 1.4 miles of Qeparo Beach, Villa Mimoza provides accommodation with a terrace and as well as free private parking for guests who drive. The air-conditioned rooms provide a sea view and come with a wardrobe and free WiFi.
At the hotel, all rooms come with a balcony. With a shared bathroom equipped with a shower and a hairdryer, rooms at Villa Mimoza also provide guests with a mountain view. At the accommodation every room is equipped with a flat-screen TV, a private bathroom, and a patio with a garden view.

name: Hotel Beach Restaurant Fabio
description:
With garden views, Hotel Beach Restaurant Fabio is set in Borsh and has a restaurant, room service, bar, garden, barbecue and terrace. Both WiFi and private parking are available at the aparthotel free of charge.
Offering a patio, all units are air conditioned and feature a dining area and a seating area with a satellite flat-screen TV. There is a private bathroom with bidet and a hairdryer in each unit, along with free toiletries.
Guests at Hotel Beach Restaurant Fabio can enjoy a à la carte breakfast.
Hiking, snorkelling and cycling are possible within the area, and the accommodation offers a private beach area.
Borsh Beach is 500 feet from Hotel Beach Restaurant Fabio.

name: Apartments Vila Emiliano
description:
Located in Borsh, Apartments Vila Emiliano offers air-conditioned accommodation. The property is 2.5 miles from Borsh Beach.
The apartments comprise a balcony with sea and garden views, a seating area and a TV. A fully equipped kitchenette contains a stovetop, a fridge and kitchenware, as well as a dining table. Private bathrooms include a shower and a washing machine.
The town of Sarandë is 22.4 miles away.
Free private parking is provided on site.

name: Horizonti Borsh
description:
Situated in Borsh, a few steps from Borsh Beach, Horizonti Borsh features accommodation with a bar, free private parking, a garden and a terrace. The air-conditioned rooms provide a river view and come with a wardrobe and free WiFi.
At the hotel, each room is equipped with a balcony with a garden view. At Horizonti Borsh the rooms have a desk, a flat-screen TV and a private bathroom.
A Full English/Irish breakfast is available each morning at the accommodation.

name: Onas House
description:
Onas House is 30 minutes walk from the beach in Borsh and offers air-conditioned accommodation with a garden, a private terrace and a balcony with sea views.
A fully equipped kitchenette contains a stovetop, a fridge and microwave, as well as a dining table. Private bathroom include a shower and a washing machine.
The property includes 2 rooms and 3 beds (2 single beds & 1 double bed).
Free private parking is provided on site. Within a short walk there is a grocery store.  We are pet friendly!
Albanian Traditional food available on request from guests.
Speaking Greek and English, staff are always on hand to help at the reception.
Corfu Town is 30.4 miles from the holiday home, while Sarandë is 14.9 miles from the property.
